content: उपस्कारः {@--1@} Anything additional, a supplement. {@--2@} (Supplying) An ellipsis; साकांक्षमनुपस्कारं विष्वग्गति निराकुलं <ls>Ki. 11. 38.</ls> {@--3@} Beautifying, ornamenting by way of adding grace; उक्तमेवार्थं सोपस्कारमाह <ls>Malli.</ls> on <ls>R. 11. 47.</ls> {@--4@} An ornament. {@--5@} A stroke. {@--6@} A collection.
